dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 5667 IH: Acer Access and Development Program Reauthorization Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Welch (for himself and Mr. Courtney) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to reauthorize the Acer Access and Development Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Acer Access and Development Program Reauthorization Act.

section.header: Acer Access and Development Program reauthorized
section.text: Section 12306(f) of the Agricultural Act of 2014 (7 U.S.C. 1632c(f)) is amended by striking 2014 through 2018 and inserting 2018 through 2023.
